meta-review.comment: Lightyear Frontier offers a delightful mix of farming, crafting, and exploration in a charming sci-fi setting. The game's non-violent approach and nature-focused gameplay bring a refreshing change to the genre. While the lack of a compelling story and some grindy moments may irk some players, the promise of future updates and the potential for cooperative play make it a promising choice for relaxation and social gaming. Strap in and enjoy the serene frontier!
